name: up2d8-monorepo
description: UP2D8 - Personal news digest and information management platform

scripts.shared:build: npm run shared:types && npm run shared:theme && npm run shared:utils && npm run shared:api
scripts.backend:install: cd packages/backend-api && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend:venv: cd packages/backend-api && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.functions:install: cd packages/functions && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.functions:venv: cd packages/functions && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend:dev: cd packages/backend-api && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --reload-dir api --reload-dir shared
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run web:install && npm run mobile:install && npm run backend:install && npm run functions:install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:functions && npm run test:mobile
